original_title: Carlos Saura Photographer - Journey of a Book
overview: The film follows the Spanish film director as he publishes a book of his mostly unknown photography. His intimate and often surprising photos create a striking portrait of daily life in 1950's Spain that contrasts with dictator Francisco Franco's propaganda. The documentary follows the two-year process of narrowing down the collection and designing the book.
title: Carlos Saura Photographer - Journey of a Book
